statements: SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_date FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id > 3
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date ASC
SELECT sensor_id, service_record FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date < '2022-06-30'
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id IN (2, 4, 6)
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id = 1
SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_date FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND maintenance_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT sensor_id, COUNT(sensor_id) AS num_records FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule GROUP BY sensor_id HAVING COUNT(sensor_id) > 1
SELECT * FROM quantum_sensor_maintenance_schedule WHERE service_record LIKE '%calibration%'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT sensor_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT sensor_id, next_maintenance_date, last_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT * FROM service_records;
SELECT sensor_id, service_date, service_type FROM service_records;
SELECT sensor_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM service_records WHERE service_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, service_type, technician_id FROM service_records WHERE technician_id IN (10, 20, 30) AND sensor_id > 100 ORDER BY sensor_id, service_type;
SELECT sensor_id, last_maintenance_date, next_maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE next_maintenance_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, technician_id FROM service_records GROUP BY technician_id HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date = '2022-12-31';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_type, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_notes LIKE '%urgent%';
SELECT * FROM service_records ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensor_details WHERE sensor_status = 'active';
SELECT * FROM sensor_details;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_location FROM sensor_details WHERE sensor_status = 'active';
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, sensor_status FROM sensor_details ORDER BY sensor_name ASC;
SELECT sensor_type, maintenance_date, maintenance_notes FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT service_type, service_date, service_notes FROM service_records WHERE service_type = 'Calibration' ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Quantumsensor;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Quantumsensor ORDER BY sensor_name DESC;
SELECT sensor_name, calibration_date FROM Quantumsensor WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM ServiceRecord WHERE service_type = 'maintenance' ORDER BY service_date ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, AVG(cost) AS average_cost FROM ServiceRecord GROUP BY sensor_id;
SELECT * FROM Quantumsensor ORDER BY sensor_name DESC, location ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM Quantumsensor WHERE calibration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT sensor_name, location, calibration_date FROM Quantumsensor WHERE sensor_name LIKE 'Temperature%';
SELECT sr.service_date, sr.service_type, ms.technician_name, sr.cost FROM ServiceRecord sr INNER JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ms ON sr.schedule_id = ms.schedule_id WHERE sr.cost > 1000;
SELECT sh.sensor_id, sh.history_date, sh.description, qs.sensor_name FROM SensorHistory sh INNER JOIN Quantumsensor qs ON sh.sensor_id = qs.sensor_id ORDER BY sh.history_date DESC, qs.sensor_name;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT id, maintenance_type FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE sensor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM service_records ORDER BY date_of_service DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, sensor_name, manufacturer FROM quantum_sensors WHERE calibration_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT service_id, date_of_service, service_type FROM service_records WHERE sensor_id = 5 AND service_type = 'Calibration';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY maintenance_date DESC, id ASC;

SELECT sensor_id, maintenance_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE maintenance_type = 'scheduled maintenance' AND sensor_id IN (SELECT sensor_id FROM service_records WHERE service_type = 'maintenance') ORDER BY sensor_id ASC;
SELECT sensor_name, manufacturer, model FROM quantum_sensors WHERE calibration_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM sensor_locations WHERE building = 'Main Building' AND room_number > 100 ORDER BY room_number ASC;
SELECT sensor_id, last_calibration_date FROM sensor_calibration WHERE next_calibration_date <= NOW();
